title: David Gilmour - 2006-03-10 - Remember This First Night
description:
Here is a nice bootleg. Check my account for more classic bootlegs.

Please enjoy, share with friends and please seed :)

David Gilmour - 2006-03-10 - Remember This First Night

Konzerthaus Dortmund, Germany

******************************************************************

DVD 16:9 - 143 min - PAL

Video: Unknown source 
Audio: Audience DAT Recording (rec 4) Sony TCD D8 + OKM mics > WAV > Flac



DVD 1
01 Castellorizon
02 On An Island
03 The Blue
04 Red Sky At Night
05 This Heaven
06 Then I Close My Eyes
07 Smile
08 Take A Breath
09 A Pocketful Of Stones
10 Where We Start

DVD 2
01 Shine On You Crazy Diamond
02 Wot's...Uh The Deal
03 Wearing The Inside Out
04 Breathe
05 Time
06 Breathe Reprise
07 Dominoes
08 High Hopes
09 Echoes
10 Wish You Were Here
11 Comfortably Numb

Video from Marooned65
Authoring by Nipote
Artwork by MkFloyd
Artwork pics by Krzychu

******************************************************************

Marooned65's notes
Celebrating the 10th anniversary of the beginning of the On An Island Tour here's a complete uncirculated  recording of the first concert.
I bought this as a 3 DVDr set a while ago, so if you want you can call it a liberated dvd.
The concert seems to be filmed with the camera on a tripod. The position seems to be last row in the middle. Although the picture quality is blurred you have a good total view what's going on at the stage.

Nipote's notes.
Nice document, I remember very well this first night, after the Mermaid Theatre, in my first days of IFWT hub.
The video have a decent audio, but sometimes you can listen phone's interference so I decided to change the audio with the excellent DAT Master for this date (rec 4) taped or from Andreas C or from Rolf, not clear after 10 years.
I made two small patches with original audio on the intro of A Pocketful Of Stones and on first notes of Wot's...Uh The Deal.
I removed some parts of pre and post show.


******************************************************************

FOR TRADE OR GIVE AWAY ONLY - DO NOT SELL !!!

Marooned65,Nipote and MkFloyd - 2016-03-10
